snippet: Hiroki Kuroda drew full support from the crowd as he turned in a masterly performance, shutting down the Texas Rangers, 3-0, on two hits.
abstract: New York Yankees defeat Texas Rangers, 3-0; Yankees pitcher Hiroki Kuroda turns in a masterly performance, carrying a no-hitter into the seventh inning and recording his fourth career shutout.
lead_paragraph: Hiroki Kuroda drew full support from the crowd as he turned in a masterly performance, shutting down the Texas Rangers, 3-0, on two hits.

headline.seo: Hiroki Kuroda Pitches Complete Game as Yankees Beat Rangers
headline.main: Kuroda Dominates as Yankees Defeat Rangers Again
headline.print_headline: Kuroda Lets Pitching Do the Talking, and Nothing Is Lost in Translation
